reviews.review: The best form of weaponized cancer which keeps you coming back for more, despite every atom of your being screaming otherwise

I've played this game since 2018 and a lot has changed, mostly for the better. The esports scene is one of the most fun and exiting, the game remains fresh wether you play on matchmaking or faceit. I dont claim to be particularly good, but there is a great gradient of skill and great games can make you feel like a god.
The best game every made.  This game is not for kids.
Ótimo jogo, melhor ainda para jogar entre amigos.
best game ever it is just perfect ,ofcourse like any other game it has bugs but this doesnt stop the game to be good

me parece un buen juego, pero una de las cosas que no me gusta que las llaves cuesten mucho mas que las caja ya que si quiero comprar una llave no deja de costar mas allá de $2,50 y me parece un poco injusto.
Ademas hay varios hackers en algunas partidas y eso arruina la experiencia del juego, pero si recomiendo que lo descarguen.

Great game but it has a horrific amount of hackers. Hopefully they clean the system of those hacking. But, gameplay is fun it has many different game modes that were added post  it's 2012 release. It has ranks as well as offers a very strategic level of competition.
